Plugin.Details: Allows making bug comments and classifying bugs on the FindBugs Cloud at http://findbugs-cloud.appspot.com.

Cloud.Description: FindBugs Cloud internal testing server (FB developers only)
Cloud.Details: Comments are stored on the FindBugs Cloud at http://theflybush.appspot.com
Comments are stored on the FindBugs Cloud at http://findbugs-cloud.appspot.com
